comment.author: 14673419@N00
comment._content: Locatie waarschijnlijk het Schuttersveld (op de achtergrond molen De Valk)

comment.author: 41628535@N04
comment._content: Location, indeed, most likely, the 'Schuttersveld', with in the background the 'Marislaan'. Affirmative that the windmill in question is the, still existing and now museum, 'Molen De Valk'. The churchtower left from the middle is of the 'Marekerk'. The building at the left hand side should be, the 'Leidsche Coöperatieve Melkinrichting 'De Landbouw' ' (Milk factory), established 1879, at the 'Rijnsburgersingel' number 23. Have a look at the following picture, from 1904, from the Leiden Regional Archives and compare yourself: www.leidenarchief.nl/index.php?option=com_memorix&Ite... and www.leidenarchief.nl/index.php?option=com_memorix&Ite...
